languages.text:
Зеркало, помещенное на стену одного из пустых складских помещений, кажется совершенно обычным. Однако через час после доставки объекта на борт Мастер вокса докладывает, что вся команда шаттла, привезшая объект, исчезла без следа.
А также — все, кто участвовал в установке.
А также — блюститель, зашедший в отсек по ошибке и заглянувший в зеркало поправить красивый (неуставный) шейный платок.

traits.locale_text:
Зеркало, помещенное на стену одного из пустых складских помещений, кажется совершенно обычным. Однако через час после доставки объекта на борт Мастер Вокса докладывает, что вся команда шаттла, привезшая объект, исчезла без следа.
А также — все, кто участвовал в установке.
А также — стражник, зашедший в отсек по ошибке и заглянувший в зеркало поправить красивый (неуставный) шейный платок.

languages.text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.
languages.original_text:
Зеркало, помещенное на стену одного из пустых складских помещений, кажется совершенно обычным. Однако через час после доставки объекта на борт Мастер вокса докладывает, что вся команда шаттла, привезшая объект, исчезла без следа.
А также — все, кто участвовал в установке.
А также — блюститель, зашедший в отсек по ошибке и заглянувший в зеркало поправить красивый (неуставный) шейный платок.

traits.locale_text: The mirror is hung on the wall in one of the compartment. It looks completely normal. However, soon the Vox Master reports that the whole shuttle crew that delivered the mirror, has disappeared. Along with those who installed it. Along with the guard who wandered into the compartment to fix his new cravat.

The mirror is hung on the wall in one of the compartment. It looks completely normal. However, soon the Vox Master reports that the whole shuttle crew that delivered the mirror, has disappeared. Along with those who installed it. Along with the guard who wandered into the compartment to fix his new cravat.

The mirror is hung on the wall in one of the compartment. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour later, the Vox Master reports that the whole shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared. Those who mounted it have disappeared. Even a guard who wandered into the compartment to fix his new cravat, gone without a trace.

The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the guard who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

languages.text: 这面镜子被挂在了某个舱室的墙上，看起来没有任何异常情况。然而，仅仅过了一个小时之后，音阵大师就报告说负责运送镜子的穿梭机船员失踪了。负责悬挂镜子的人也失踪了。甚至就连某个误入了船舱，在船舱里整理（不符合规定的）新领带的执法者，也都消失得无影无踪。
languages.original_text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

traits.locale_text: 这面镜子被挂在了某个舱室的墙上，看起来没有任何异常情况。然而，仅仅过了一个小时之后，音阵大师就报告说负责运送镜子的穿梭机船员失踪了。负责悬挂镜子的人也失踪了。甚至就连某个误入了船舱，在船舱里整理（不符合规定的）新领带的镇压者，也都消失得无影无踪。

languages.text:
El espejo se cuelga en el muro de uno de los compartimentos, y sigue pareciendo perfectamente normal. Sin embargo, una hora después de su llegada, la maestra de vocos informa de que la tripulación de la lanzadera que lo subió a bordo ha desaparecido.
Al igual que las personas que lo colgaron.
Incluso el guardia que entró al compartimento por error e intentó recolocarse su nuevo pañuelo (no regulado) se ha desvanecido sin dejar rastro.
languages.original_text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

traits.locale_text:
El espejo se cuelga en el muro de uno de los compartimentos, y sigue pareciendo perfectamente normal. Sin embargo, una hora después de su llegada, la maestra de vocos informa de que la tripulación de la lanzadera que lo subió a bordo ha desaparecido.
Al igual que las personas que lo colgaron.
Incluso el guardia que entró al compartimento por error e intentó recolocarse su nuevo pañuelo (no regulado) se ha desvanecido sin dejar rastro.

languages.text:
鏡は今、区画室の壁の一角に掛かっている。見た目はまったく問題がない。しかし到着からわずか1時間後、鏡を届けたシャトルのクルーが姿を消したとヴォクス・マスターが報告した。
鏡を吊るした人々も姿を消した。
間違って区画室に迷い込み、新しい（規定外の）クラバットを直すために立ち止まった執行官も、跡形もなく消えてしまった。
languages.original_text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

traits.locale_text:
鏡は今、区画室の壁の一角に掛かっている。見た目はまったく問題がない。しかし到着からわずか1時間後、鏡を届けたシャトルのクルーが姿を消したとヴォクス・マスターが報告した。
鏡を吊るした人々も姿を消した。
間違って区画室に迷い込み、新しい（規定外の）クラバットを直すために立ち止まった執行官も、跡形もなく消えてしまった。

languages.text:
Der Spiegel hängt nun an der Wand in einem der Module. Er sieht vollkommen normal aus. Aber nur eine Stunde nach seiner Ankunft berichtet die Voxmeisterin, dass die Shuttlecrew, die den Spiegel geliefert hat, verschwunden ist.
Auch die Crewmitglieder, die den Spiegel aufgehängt haben, sind verschwunden.
Selbst der Enforcer, der versehentlich in das Modul spaziert ist und kurz stehengeblieben ist, um seine (nicht den Vorschriften entsprechende) neue Krawatte zu richten, ist spurlos verschwunden.
languages.original_text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

traits.locale_text:
Der Spiegel hängt nun an der Wand in einem der Module. Er sieht vollkommen normal aus. Aber nur eine Stunde nach seiner Ankunft berichtet die Voxmeisterin, dass sie Shuttlecrew, die den Spiegel geliefert hat, verschwunden ist.
Auch die Crewmitglieder, die den Spiegel aufgehängt haben, sind verschwunden.
Selbst der Enforcer, der versehentlich in das Modul spaziert ist und kurz stehengeblieben ist, um seine (nicht den Vorschriften entsprechende) neue Krawatte zu richten, ist spurlos verschwunden.

languages.text:
Le miroir est désormais accroché au mur d'un des compartiments. Il a l'air tout à fait normal. Cependant, à peine une heure après son arrivée, le maître de vox signale que l'équipage de la navette qui avait apporté le miroir a disparu.
Les personnes ayant accroché le miroir ont elles aussi disparu.
Même l'exécutant qui s'est aventuré dans le compartiment par erreur et s'est arrêté devant le miroir pour ajuster sa nouvelle cravate (non réglementaire) s'est volatilisé sans laisser de trace.
languages.original_text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.

Les personnes ayant accroché le miroir ont elles aussi disparu.
Même l'exécutant qui s'est aventuré dans le compartiment par erreur et s'est arrêté devant le miroir pour ajuster sa nouvelle cravate (non réglementaire) s'est volatilisé sans laisser de trace.

languages.text:
Ayna, kompartımanlardan birinde duvara asılıyor. Gayet normal görünüyor. Bununla birlikte gemiye getirilişinden bir saat sonra Voks Üstadı, aynayı getiren mekik mürettebatının ortadan kaybolduğunu bildiriyor.
Aynayı asanlar da aynı şekilde ortalıkta yok.
Yanlışlıkla kompartımana giren ve yeni (yönetmelik dışı) kravatını düzeltmek için aynanın karşısına geçen infazcı bile iz bırakmadan ortadan kaybolmuş durumda.
languages.original_text:
The mirror now hangs on the wall in one of the compartments. It looks completely normal. However, only an hour after its arrival, the Vox Master reports that the shuttle crew that delivered the mirror has disappeared.
The people who hung the mirror have also disappeared.
Even the enforcer who wandered into the compartment by mistake and stopped to fix his new (non-regulation) cravat has vanished without a trace.
